So, I went to the jewelry store willing to invest in something nice for her since she doesn’t have a lot of yellow gold. No luck. —She only owns a handful of things but all are really and high quality. But, she actually liked it! It was worth the money to try. — it’s it well made and looks like real gold. Will be an heirloom, no.  Does it look like something I spent 100x on? According to my wife, yep.

评论概述: It's Legit! The circles really have style.
评论详情: I didn't know what to expect. Figured Amazon has free returns, right??!! Other than it being a little more yellow orange than I would like (18k plate) this is a really nice piece of jewelry to dress up an outfit or be your new favorite go-to. I think the circles are a nice quality. While hollow so they aren't too heavy, they are weighted so they remain in place. The circles are large enough for someone to take notice- get your compliment,girl - but still small enough to make this dainty enough for class and everyday wear. The necklace has a the length option so you can have the option to wear it short or just a tad longer if you have a small neck. If you have a thicker neck, the adjustable length option will give you some 'play'.  Be aware, the clasp is small. If you have nails or gel overlay making your nails thick, may be a little tricky.
Just got it and I love how it looks, doesn’t feel cheap.
Would have been really nice if it hadn't broke the literal second I opened it.

I had been thinking about this for a long time before I pulled the trigger and well…wow. It is shockingly pretty, heavy, and beautiful. Came packaged in a nice gift box. It would be worth it at twice the price.  I’m sorry I waited so long. I ordered the white gold version immediately upon opening it.  This would make a great gift. Don’t hesitate, if you’re on the fence, just buy it.
I really like the design of this necklace.  Unfortunately it is too yellow and so it looks obviously fake.  I don’t want to wear it because it looks cheap and a doesn’t match my real gold jewellery.

I didn't find this to by dainty at all and I wasn't going for that.  The style is good and even trendy but the color of the gold makes it look cheap and not gold - way too yellow.  Not something I will wear.

Really impressed with this simple yet interesting necklace. The two rings are interlocked with a doubled chain on either side. The necklace is adjustable so it can be worn as a looser choker or a short necklace. The rings have a heavy weight to them and feel expensive. The chain is on the thinner side, but does not tangle easily.  This necklace has quickly become a regularly worn item. It pairs well with casual outfits or can be dressed up with more earrings. It’s fun to fidget with while working. With regular wear I have had no issues with tarnishing or discoloring my neck. I’d highly recommend this necklace due to its versatility and the quality of its craftsmanship.

You cannot go wrong with this. It is very elegant, beautiful  gold finish. The necklace sits beautifully. I got many compliments on it. The price is perfect for people like me that lose expensive jewelry.
Love this necklace. It looks super expensive, and so far has not tarnished but I have not gotten it wet. I get a ton of compliments on it
Very pretty necklace.  Happy with my purchase.
I love the design but it broke within the first 24 hours I wore it :(

Pretty. It came tangles up 🥴 but I was able to easily get that out. It looks just like the photos..the yellow is a tad bright in color compared to my other jewelry that are 14k gold,  it it’s still a unique and attractive design. The clasp closes securely and it’s comfortable to wear.
Super simple cute necklace. I did have a time keeping it from getting twisted.

评论概述: Elegant and very classy.  Looks expensive!
评论详情: The ALLENCOCO GOLD NECKLACE is so much prettier than I had imagined.  When my Mom got a look at it, she immediately  commented on how beautiful it was and wanted to try it on. I took a close-up picture with this around her neck.  You can see how pretty and delicate it is.  It also isn’t so small that you don’t notice it right away.  It shows up without being flashy.It is unusual looking for such a simple design.  I think it looks elegant and classy.It was packaged in a nice gift box.  At the price it is selling for, I don’t think you can go wrong choosing this either for yourself or as a gift.  It looks far more expensive than it is.

I LOVE this necklace.  My husband actually picked it out!  Impressive, eh?  It's unique in the design of both chain and "nugget".  The necklace is dainty and lightweight; a very simple and elegant piece!  Absolutely recommend!
Dainty minimalist necklace. Love it
